titles.title: A resolution designating the month of April 2014 as "Military and Veterans Caregiver Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
3/27/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the month of April 2014 as Military and Veterans Caregiver Month.
Honors caregivers of members of the Armed Forces and veterans for their service and sacrifice to the United States.
Calls upon the people of the United States to observe such month and to participate in activities that will show support to military families and their sacrifices in service to the United States.
